text: Painted Youth () is a 1929 German silent film directed by Carl Boese and starring Toni van Eyck, Wolfgang Zilzer, and Olga Limburg. The film's sets were designed by Karl Machus. ==Cast== ==References== ==Bibliography== * ==External links== * Category:1929 films Category:German films Category:Films of the Weimar Republic Category:German silent feature films Category:Films directed by Carl Boese Category:National Film films Category:German black-and- white films
title: Painted Youth
